skillTree.localised_description: The ancestral blade of the Riel family. Shakkara's grandfather broke into the estate of a family of Tiranoc's nobles and slaughtered with this sword everyone he met. Some say that he was imbued with the primal horror that his victims experienced before their terrible demise.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Shakkara Riel's bag. Only for emergency needs!

effects.description:
[hidden] additional replenishment rate for lords and heroes
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Potion of Toughness"

skillTree.localised_description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

skillTree.localised_description: The corrupted Dark Pegasi fly south from the Chaos Wastes to Naggaroth's Iron Mountains to make their nests.

skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Upon a barren and bleak coast sits the city of Arnheim, and it is here that Shakkara has made her seat of power. Her raiding across the seas brings in the most bountious and valuable hauls of captives, and the magic she performs with High Elves is especially prized.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Dark Riders and Black Ark Corsairs
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Dark Riders and Black Ark Corsairs
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Dark Riders and Black Ark Corsairs
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Many consider harpies to be pathetic scavengers, unable to harm a trained warrior, but after meeting with her claws they realize that no armor and no shield will save them from this dark and unbridled rage.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +300% for Dark Rider units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing missile damage: +200% for Corsair Handbow units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Druchii are swift and difficult to predict. Ambushes - their favorite strategy for clogging their ship holds.
These terrible creatures follow the trail of destroyed villages and slaughtered armies left behind by Shakkara.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Harpy and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Harpy and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

Charge: +12 for Harpy and Kharibdyss units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: This poison contains a powerful narcotic that drives its victims to delusional insanity.
The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

skillTree.localised_description: "Worthless scum! Stop robbing corpses! GO! INTO BATTLE! BEFORE I RIP OUT YOUR GUTS MYSELF!"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

items.colour_text: The ancestral blade of the Riel family. Shakkara's grandfather broke into the estate of a family of Tiranoc's nobles and slaughtered with this sword everyone he met. Some say that he was imbued with the primal horror that his victims experienced before their terrible demise.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

items.colour_text: A disfigured and pathetic Kislevite gone mad, who, however, is surprisingly willing to share his experience in fighting the forces of chaos. His family and home were destroyed by the Troll King Trogg, and he himself fled far to the south, where he was captured by the dark elves.

effects.description: Melee attack: +12 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs, Norsca and Beastmen

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Shakkara is incredibly skilled in the art of surprise attacks, luring victims into traps that soon see them chained inside the hull of her ship. Once, she kidnapped a Tiranoc princess for the flaw of sharing her name. Rumor has it the princess is still suffering in the cellars of the Riel family palace.

effects.description:
Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Lord's army)
